titleStmt.title: Cupid's courtship, or, The celebration of a marriage between the god of love and Psiche
titleStmt.author: Marmion, Shackerley, 1603-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.O. for Thomas Dring,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A moral poem on the marriage of Cupid and Psiche.
Attributed by Wing to Shackerley Marmion.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
